FAQ

Disclaimer: This FAQ-section is not part of the official statement but is meant to provide background information. The content of this section is not explicitly supported by the signatories.

The consensus in the scientific community across all fields is that a low number of cases is better than the alternative in all aspects. As the pandemic is not under control in Europe, we, a group of European researchers, have organised the formulation of this statement. We advocate for the common European goal of keeping case numbers low as coordination of measures is crucial. The statement is supported by numerous signatories from epidemiology, economics, medicine and many other fields. Among these are also presidents of national science academies and advisors to the EU commission. This effort was coordinated by Viola Priesemann.
